Blog

Assistant Teaching Professor - Ball State University. Queer archival rhetoric, new materialisms, and media theory.

I am an Assistant Teaching Professor at Ball State University. I research queer rhetoric, new materialism, and archives. Additionally, I have been involved in a number of digital publishing efforts, most notably as a Section Editor at Kairos: A Journal of Rhetoric, Technology and Pedagogy.

On Political Parties (But Not the Kind You're Thinking)

Sep 28, 2019

Donald Trump is in no uncertain terms a fascist.
